medical_history.chief_complaint: Hospitalization after a crash in an all-terrain vehicle resulting in a liver laceration.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Initially hospitalized after the accident. At 21 weeks gestation, patient presented requesting detoxification from opioids, reporting daily use of approximately 60 mg of oxycodone. Patient had an extensive history of prescription medication abuse, received from multiple providers and family/friends. Multiple emergency department visits for opioid medications noted.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of anxiety and depression with two psychiatric hospitalizations. Previous treatment with alprazolam, fluoxetine, and bupropion, which she discontinued.
medical_history.social_history: Single, college-educated, primigravid Caucasian woman. Denied use of tobacco and reported discontinuation of alcohol upon learning of her pregnancy. Previous inconsistency in participating in the buprenorphine program.
